mapper.insert: insert into user_access_log ( log_time, log_type_id, user_id, user_ip, user_op_type, menu_id, log_detail )values( #{log_time}, #{log_type_id}, #{user_id}, #{user_ip}, #{user_op_type}, #{menu_id}, #{log_detail} )
mapper.select:
select a.log_id log_id,a.log_time log_time,c.log_type_name log_type_id,b.user_real_name user_id,a.user_ip,case a.user_op_type when '0' then'登录' when '1'then '退出' when '2'then '调用菜单' end as user_op_type, d.menu_cn_name menu_id,a.log_detail from user_access_log a left join sys_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id left JOIN log_type c on a.log_type_id=c.log_type_id left JOIN sys_menu d on a.menu_id=d.menu_id
order by log_time DESC
